description: Muslims brought prayer mats and face masks to a huge car park for socially-distanced prayers.
title: Coronavirus: German Ikea car park used for mass Eid prayer
title_page: Coronavirus: German Ikea car park used for mass Eid prayer - BBC News
maintext: "But the store manager didn't hesitate for a second and said 'yes, you can pray'. I was surprised and happy at the same time," Mr Terzi explained, who then organised the prayer along with Ditib Wetzlar mosque.
